name: Animal party [prototype]
description:
Animal party is a prototype I am working on since september 2018 in which I turn everything I love about life, in minigames, in which 4 players compete for the best (or worst) place.
The minigames include (but are not limited to) games, movies and things I enjoy(ed) doing in my life.

Controller is recommended but you can play with the keyboard.

I try to create 1-3 minigame prototypes every week after my full-time job.
From time to time I will also expand the UI, world, gameplay and overall feel of the game.
I also plan on giving every minigame a different set of options and in the future there will be unlockable levels and options and even different modes like "random levels", "tournaments", etc.

I have planned over 50 minigames and keep expanding and exploring ideas every day.

I hope you will enjoy some minigames and when you do(n't), let me know because feedback is important.
In the early stages it will all feel really unfinished but feedback is still appreciated!

In the early days I also planned to create the easier to realise minigames first, but there will be some fun complex minigames coming too!
